Name: objoid
Description: The oid of the object this description pertains\n to

Name: classoid
Description: The oid of the system catalog this object appears\n in

Name: objsubid
Description: For a comment on a table attribute, this is the\n attribute's column number (the objoid and classoid refer to the table itself). For all other object types, this field is presently zero.

Name: description
Description: Arbitrary text that serves as the description of this\n object.
